class.name: org.n52.sos.ds.hibernate.entities.ObservableProperty
class.subselect: (SELECT @id:=@id+1 AS observablePropertyId, 'F' AS hibernateDiscriminator, column_name AS identifier, NULL AS description FROM (SELECT DISTINCT column_name FROM information_schema.columns WHERE table_schema = 'sea' AND data_type = 'double' ORDER BY column_name) AS t1, (SELECT @id:=0) AS t2))
